alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Dale and northern Coffee Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 514 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brundidge to near Glenwood to Brantley to 8 miles northwest of Dozier. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Fort Rucker, Ozark, New Brockton, Ariton, Lee, Pine Level, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Dill, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Arguta, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Roeton, Dale County Lake, Marley Hill and Camp Alaflo Bsa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
